title: Account Manager - Touring
copyHTML: As Account Manager you will join our team of 6 reporting into the Head of Touring. You will manage the day-to-day running of the account. Therefore the ideal candidate will be able to build strong relationships with clients and acts as a trusted partner to help achieve our vision.

title: Publishing Designer
copyHTML: As Publishing Designer you will be responsible for, creating printed programmes and brochures for some of the most prestigious venues in Londonâ€™s West End and beyond

title: Graduate Digital Account Executive
copyHTML: As a Digital Account Executive at Dewynters you will have a key role within our Media team and will be responsible for the overall team administration through excellent organisational skills, attention to detail, timely and accurate campaign activation, reporting and reconciliation.
